text: Reidar Alveberg (June 20, 1916 – December 12, 2004) was a Norwegian bobsledder who competed in the 1950s. He finished 13th in the four-man event at the 1952 Winter Olympics in Oslo. He was born in Berg and died in Oslo. ==References== *1952 bobsleigh four-man results *Bobsleigh four-man results: 1948-64. title: Reidar Alveberg
